item.title: Lime bikes blocking pavement, 15th November
item.description:

item.title: Inappropriate dumping of waste, 15th November
item.description:
They leave their refuse on the walkway instead of placing it properly in the bin. When the wind blows, the trash scatters and litters the street, making the area very dirty. This problem began when the black bins were introduced.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plumstead High Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
